archimate:BusinessObject.name: Gizmo
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
https://github.com/emehrkay/gizmo Gizmo is a lightweight asynchronous Python 3.5+ Object Graph Mapper (O.G.M.) for the Tinkerpop Rexster graphs. About
Gizmo starts and ends with Gremlin/Groovy. It is made up of entity, mapper, query, request, response, and other objects whose job is to convert pure Python to a Gremlin/Groovy string to be executed on a server.
